text_block_list.text:
It had been a while since 
I became Orfevre's trainer——

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
——This is the King's order. 
Entertain me.
choice_data_list: Eeh!? Even if you say that……

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
Hmph……how dull. Fine. 
——Golshi! Is Golshi around!?

I've been with Orfevre for a while now, but I still don't 
really understand how she sees me……honestly, it was baffling.

text_block_list.name: Mecha PR Rep
text_block_list.text:
——I see! 
So that leg power is Orfevre's strength, huh!?
choice_data_list: Of course, that's only part of it.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
Enough flattery. 
Continue.

text_block_list.name: Mecha PR Rep
text_block_list.text: Ah……Ahahahahaha, I apologize for that!

text_block_list.name: Mecha PR Rep
text_block_list.text:
T-then, I'd like to ask you for a review of our product…… 
We have many different training related supplies but first is——

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
I'll allow it. 
Explain it in detail.

text_block_list.name: Mecha PR Rep
text_block_list.text:
Yes! This is the latest high performance leg massager that incorporates 
cutting-edge medicinal theories from around the sports world!

text_block_list.name: Mecha PR Rep
text_block_list.text:
A huge amount of fatigue can accumulate in the legs of Uma 
Musume due to their high speed running! This can remove that 
fatigue just like that～, it's our best new product!

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
Very well. 
——Hey, you will prove that for them. By using your own body.

I place my legs in to the device and secure it in place 
using the attached belts. Then I hold the switch in my hand.

text_block_list.name: Mecha PR Rep
text_block_list.text: Ah——

——So, you may be wondering why there were belts attached to 
this leg massager. Well, I figured that out right away.

An Uma Musume could achieve speeds of 70km/h. In order to 
relieve stiffness from legs that could do that, it was 
only natural the massage would be equally more intense.

text_block_list.name: Mecha PR Rep
text_block_list.text:
S-s-s-s-s-sorry～! 
It's something that's calibrated for Uma Musume……!

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
……Fuu. 
……Haha——!

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
Now, this is quite amusing. 
To think you had it in you to become a clown.

text_block_list.name: Mecha PR Rep
text_block_list.text:
The switch……the switch is by your knees……! 
I-I'll turn it off now so please stop moving……!

After that, we finally managed to remove the device, but apparently 
the noise we made was so loud almost the entire Academy could hear it.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: ——That was more enjoyable than I expected.

text_block_list.name: Mecha PR Rep
text_block_list.text:
T-then can we take it as our 
product has your approval……?

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: Umu. Use that knowledge well.

While I was rolling around in pain, 
my eyes met Orfevre's for just a moment.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: ——Heh.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
Rejoice. 
You have "talent".

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: ——A role that only you can perform.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: Continue to cultivate that talent.

It seemed like she was praising me but…… 
what exactly interested her about that interaction? 
I could hardly rejoice through the lingering pain.
